string.value: Tum koi game me nahi ho abhi ke liye...
{0} ne ek game start kiya hai. /join use kare game khelne ko....aur shayad marne ko :P
{0} ne ek naya game start kiya! /join use kare khaye jaane ke liye!
{0} ne ek chaos game start kiya hai! /join use kare game khelne ko....aur shayad marne ko :P
{0} ne ek naya chaos game start kiya! /join use kare khaye jaane ke liye!
Abhi join nai kar sakte ! Game chalu ho chuka hai.
Join kar chuke ho tum!
1 minute bacha hai /join karne ke liye
{0} seconds bache hai /join karne ke liye
Player kam hai, game cancel karna padega!
Game shuru ho rha hai, krupya ruke jabtak me sabke roles nirdharit aur database ko update karta hu.
{0} exploit karne ke liye bahar kar diye gaye hai (koi naam / se start nai ho sakta)
{0}, join karne ke liye naam change kare
Maaf karna, isse jyada khiladi nai aa sakte hai!
{0} ne join kiya game. {1} khiladi, {2} kam se kam, {3} jyada se jyada
{0} krupya mujhe PM kare (@{1}) /start likhke, Mere pass record nai hai aapka mujhe PM karte hue. Mujhe aapko PM karne ke liye aapka mujhe PM karna zaruri hai!.
Bhag mat bhagode. Tu mara pada hai. Gadde me ghus jaa fattu
{0} ki gaand fat gayi!
{0} khiladi bache hai.
Maine abtak kuch pucha nai!
Tum khelte hue nazar nai aa rhe... Kya baat ho gai
Us naam ka koi player nai mil rha!
Galat jawab hai ye!
{0} {1} ko khana chata hai
{0} {1} ko maarna chata hai
{0} 2 raat se so rha hai. Achai ki taakato ne isse ghor apmaan mana hai, aur {0} ko maar diya jaata hai. {1}
Saale dhokebaaz!! Tu bhediya hai ab..
Apka chunav mazoor hai
\nSeer hai {0}
{0} seer tha. Uske chhatra hone ke naate ab tu naye seer ho.
{0} chhatra the, ab vo {1} ki jagah banne ke liye naye Seer ban rhe hai.
Tumne dekha {0} {1} hai!
Kisko maarna chahte ho?
Kisko pakadna chate ho?
Kisko udana chate ho? {0} bullet(s) remain
Kisko chodna chate ho?
Kisko dekhna chate ho?
Kisko batana chate ho?
Kisko khaana chahate ho?
Kiska shikaar karna chate ho?
Kaun hai tumhara preranasrot?(role model)
Kisko tum apna aadmi banana chate ho?
{0} se baat karke faisla lo
aur
Tum Shraapit (Cursed) ho. Tum abhi toh gaovale ho, agar bhediyo ne tumhe maara, toh tum khud bhediye ban jaoge.
Tum Jaasoos (Detective) ho. Din me, tum ek player ka chera benakab kar sakte ho. But, aisa karte wakt tumhari bhumika/chera bhediyo ko pata chal sakti hai! (40% chance)
Badhaiya! Tum gao ke bevde ho! (jaise ki kisiko pata hi nai...)
Tum ho Rakshak Devdoot (Guardian Angel). Har raat, tum ek khiladi ko bacha sakte ho. Magar, aisa karte hue agar bhediye ko chuna, 50% chance hai ki tum maroge.
Tum ho bandookvale (Gunner). Do goliya hai tumhare pass. Din me, ek khiladi ko tum uda sakte ho. Sabko awaaz aayegi bandook ki, aur samjh jaenge ki tum hi bandookvale ho (Bhediye nai).

Saali Hawas ki Poojarin NO5! Tu Randi hai. Raat ke wakt, tu doosre khiladi ke pass jaa sakte ho dekhne ke liye vo bhediya hai ki nai. Agar tum bhediye ke pass jaati ho, ya uske pass jaati ho jiske pass bhediya bhi gaya hai, tum marogi. Agar tum bhediye ke ghar jaati ho and bhediya ghar pe nahi rha, tum bach jaogi.
Dhokebaaz! Abhi ke liye tum gaaovale ho, but sab marne ke baad tum bhediye ban jaoge. Agar seer tumhe dekhta hai, tum shayad bhediye dikh sakte ho use.
XD TUM BHEDIYE HO!! (maze kar) Har raat kisiko maar sakte ho tum.
Tum paigambar (Seer) ho. Har raat, tum ek khiladi ka chera dekh sakte ho, aur uski bhoomika jaan sakte ho.
Tum ek gawti gaowaale ho, Kaam karne aur marne ke alawa kuch kaam nai hai tumhara.
Tum chutiye (Tanner) ho. Agar sab log tumhe maarne ki saaza de, tum jeet jaaoge!
Tum khatarnak bacche (Wild Child) ho, koi ek khiladi ko apna prernastotra (role model) banao - Wo mara toh tum bhediye ban jaoge.
Tum dekhne vale (Beholder) ho, tumhe bataya jaega kaun (asli) paigambar (Seer) hai - Yehi tumhara kaam hai.
Tum paigambar (Seer) ke chhatra ko. Agar (Asli) Paigambar (Seer) mar jaata hai, tum uski jagah loge.
Tum saampradaayik (Cultist) ho. Har raat, tum ek khiladi ko saampradaayik (Cultist) bana sakte ho. Agar game samapt hone pe sab saampradaayik (Cultist) hai toh tum khel jeet jaate ho.

Ek saampradaayik (Cultist) hai gao me, sabko badalna chata hai! Har raat, ek khiladi ko chuno. Agar voh saampradaayik (Cultist) hai toh vo maare jaemge. Agar vo saampradaayik (Cultist) tumhe badalna chaahe toh unka sabse naya khiladi mar jaega.
Shyaam hone ayi, aur gaovaale soch rahe hai kisko marne ki saza di jaae Sabke pass {0} seconds hai apna vote dene ke liye!
Subah ho gai maamu. Sabke paas {0} seconds hai apne aarop / bachao / baate ke liye.
Raat ho gai gabbar. Sab sone jaa rhe hai, ek thakane vale din ke baad. Raat ke khiladi: tumhare paas {0} seconds hai apne kaarya karne ke liye!
Apne apne vote de chuke hai gaovale, aur sandeh ke beecho beech. {0} ko marne ki saza sunai gai. {1}
Dhaag ka nirnaya nai kar paane pe, gaovaale apne ghar chale gaye, dimag kharab hote hue sabka...
Kuch gadbad hai! Koi gaovala aaya hi nai saza dene.....
Gaovale subah ikhatha hue, but {0} nazar nai aaye. Uske ghar gaye toh dekha, {0} ke saare ang bahar nikaale gaye the, ek purana billa unke gale me atkaya gaya tha.
Subah hui, aur sabne aashchaya se dekha , mandir ke chaukhat pe {0}, devdoot (Guardian Angel) mare pade the
Jab sab apne ghar se nikle, Unko bandook ke tukde mile... fir pairo ke.. fir ungliyo ke.. fir kue (well) me tairti hui, {0} ki lash, jisko bhediyo ne maar diya. Tumne tumhara bandookvala kho diya.
Subah subah gaovale uthe, {0} ke tukde nazar aaye jo ek ouija board pe pade the tarot cards ke sath. Paigambar(Seer) mar chuka hai.
Sab uthe toh jalte hue daaru aur lakdi ki badbu aai... Madhushaala me aag lagi thi!!!! Aag bujhane ke baad {0} ke bache hue hisse mile, jo faade gaye the....
Jaise jaise suraj ugne laga, sabne dekha {0} ouija board pe baitha tha, magar bicycle playing cards leke??? KAISA LUND HAI!
Jaise hi sab subah uthe, unko ek bekar badbu aai. Badbu ke piche gaye toh {0} mila jiske chithade ud chuke the, aur sar gayab tha. NOMNOMNOMNOM {1}
Badi gandi bas aa rhi hai {0} ke ghar se... gaovaale dekhne gaye toh ek laash dikhi ek altar pe... Ek saampradaayik (Cultist) ko shikari ne maar diya!
Gaovale sab ikhatha hue toh chain ki saas li, kyuki pichle raat koi hamla nai hua tha
Tumhe bhediyo ne maar diya. Shraapit hone ke naate, tum bhi ek bhediye ho abse!
Tumhare saathi bhediye: {0}
{0} ko kaata.... magar vo shraapit tha, Ab vo bhi bhediya ban gaya! Khushiya manao apne naye saaathi ke liye!
Tumhe bhediya kha gaye. NOMNOMNOMNOM
Are nahi! {0} bevda tha saala! Ab tum bhi bevde ho gaye, aur kisiko bhi agli raat nahi maar sakte..
Tumne ek bhediye ki raksha karni chahi! Bhediye tumhe kha gaye.
Tumne {0} ki jaan bacha li!
{0} pe hamla nai hua, toh tumne jyada kuch nai kiya.
Tum {0} ki raksha karne gaye, magar koi ghar pe nahi tha!
Ek devdoot tumpe nazar rakh rha tha, aur bhediyo ko maar bhagaya!
Randi ne galti ki aur ghar pe baithi rahi. {0} ko bhediyo ne kha liya!
Ajeeb hai... {0} ghar pe nahi thi! Koi khaana nai tumhare liye...
Tum {0} ke ghar jaate ho thode mazze karne ke liye, dekha toh bhediya tha waha. Tum maare gaye.
{0} kal raat galat ghar me ghus gayi! Us randi ke bache hue hisse mandir ke darwaze pe laga diye hathode se. Bura hua :(
{0} {1} ke ghar gayi, thode mazze karke tanaav utarne ke liye. Magar, usne dekha ki ek bhediya {1} ko kha rha tha! Bhediya fatak se {0} ke taraf mud ke kooda aur... {0} maare gaye.
Tumne dekha {0} bhediya nai hai, aur tumhari puri raat jamke chudai hui!
Thoda andhera tha, toh tum itne aasani se dekh nai paaye, magar achanak raat ko tum jaag jaate ho, tumhe randi chodte hue... Dono apna apna kaam nipta lete ho, fir vo chupke se bhaag jati hai...
Tumne {0} ko taak-jhaak karte hue dekha! Vo jaasoos hai!
Tumhari jaasoosi ne dikhayi ki {0} {1} hai!
Aisa lag rha hai ki {0} HIV positive ho gaya randi chodne ke baad! Bandookvale ne apna badla le liya. {1} mar chuke hai.
Achanak, ek goli ki awaaz aayi. Gaowaalo ne dekha ki {0} {1} ke laash pe khada tha, uske sar par abhi tak bandook tane hue. {2}
Bhediya jeet gaya!
Bhediye jeet gaye!
Gaovaale jeet gaye! Sab bhediye maare gaye....
Are nai, Tumnne chutiye (Tanner) ko marne ki saza di. Vo jeet gaya gawti logo!
Bache hue zinda khiladi, kirdaar, aur team:
{0} {1} ko badalna chata hai
{0} ko tumhara ganda kaam karne ke liye bheja gaya hai, aur {1} ko badalne gaye... magar, vo saampradaayik shikhari (Cult Hunter) nikla! {0} mar gaya!
{0} tumhare ghar aaya tumhe maarne.... magar tumne ek talwar ghusa di uske sar me. ek saampradaayik (Cultist) mar chuka hai... {1} bacha hai!
Panth (Cult) ne tumhe badal diya hai! tum ab ek saampradaayik (Cultist) ho. Har doosri raat, tumhe mauka milega doosre khiladi ko apne panth me lene ke liye.
Saampradaayik (Cultists): {0}
{0} ne panth (Cult) join kar liya hai!
{0} ko tumhara ganda kaam karne ke liye bheja gaya, aur {1} ko badalne gaye vo... magar koi ghar pe nai tha!
Sab bhediye mar gaye, aur jo khiladi bache the unko saampradaayik (Cultist) bana diya gaya hai.. Panth jeet gaya!
Tum {0} ko maarne gaye, MAgar vo pehle hi mar chuke hai!
Tum {0} ke ghar jaate ho, aur tumne dekha vo koi anjaane bhagwaan se prathna kar rha tha... Tumne jaldi se apni talwar uske seene me daag di. Ek saampradaayik (Cultist) maara gaya!
Tum {0} ke ghar jaate ho, magar vaha kuch ajeebo-garib nai ho rha tha. Vo saampradaayik (Cultist) nahi the, toh tum ghar laut gaye.
{0} ke prernastortra (Role Model) mar gaye! Gusse me, woh bhediye ban gaye!
{0} mar gaye! Gusse me, voh bhediye ban gaye! Tumhare naye saathi hai: {1}

a Majdoor 👷
Tum ek Majdoor ho, agar koi aur majdoor hai toh tumhe pata chal jaega, nahi toh tum gaovale hi ho.
Jaise gaovale uthe, unhone dekha ki patharo me ek majdooor ka sar ghusa pada tha, sab jagah khoon uda tha. Tumhara ek majdoor mar chuka hai! -- {0}
Majdoor hai: {0}
Tumhara sabse naya khiladi {0} ke ghar gaya use badalne, magar dekha ki vo ghar pura tahas-mahas tha, sab jagah khoon tha, aur bhediyo ke pao ke nishaan the waha...
Puri paltan {0} ke ghar gai use khaane ko magar dekha ki, ek bada sa daravna aadmi tha vaha, puri tara hathiyaarbandh. Devdoot (Guardian Angel) sabko maar bhagata hai, aur tum ghar laut jaate ho.
Tum {0} ko bhejte ho {1} ko badlne, magar unke mann me vishwash tha, aur tum unhne nai badal paaye :(
@{1}, ek khiladi vohi naam ke sath {0} pehle hi aa chuka hai. Krupya apna naam badle khelne ke liye.

Tum {0}ke ghar gaye thode mazze karne ke liye... magar jaise hi tum jaa rhe the, tumne ek moorti dekhi, jise acchi tarah nai chhupaya gaya tha, ek baju ke kamre me, ajeeb si roshni aane lagi vaha se....
tha
Sab subah uthte hai, dekhte hai ki {0} aas paas nai hai... Voh dekhte hai ki {0} ke bache kuche hisse pade the uske ghar pe.
Sab subah uthe, toh unhe {0} ki laash ke bache kuche hisse dikhe, ko kal raat kaise toh mar gaya...
Ajeeb hai.... {0} aaj subah masons meeting ke liye aaye nahi aaj.... O.o
